entry.title: I knew you were trouble
entry.summary:
Author: norman123

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,455Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 54

Summary: Derek has never been particularly interested in Peter‚Äôs personal life, but when his uncle returns from Canada with a new "husband," he realizes‚Äîthis is a disaster.Stiles is too loud, too bold, and far too good at getting in his way.Derek is certain that there‚Äôs something off about this "marriage," but the more he watches Stiles, the harder it becomes to ignore that anger isn‚Äôt the only thing he feels.What if he isn‚Äôt furious because Stiles became part of their family‚Äîbut because he didn‚Äôt become part of his life?

entry.title: Morning Dew
entry.summary:
Author: Samandiriel (kyra516)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,645Chapters: 5/10Kudos: 75

Summary: Stiles had always been a bit of an odd bunny compared to his peers. He had this sense of adventure and the need to explore! His father said he got most of it from his late mother. His father also called it recklessness and lack of self-preservation. Most of the time, Stiles just dismissed his father as being plain wrong.Today however? Today he reckoned his father was completely and truly right in his judgement. Because today, Stiles had made the most reckless and stupid decision of his life. You see, Stiles had the brilliant idea of venturing into wolf lands to do some gathering, and so here he was, on the other side of the river, in the unknown lands that no bunny before him had dared to venture into. What could possibly go wrong?It was all Jackson's fault anyway.¬† ---The story is finished and will be fully published either by me, or in case of my death, by my friend. You will not be left hanging. ---

entry.title: Do you have a 100 words for me? ('Cause I have only three)
entry.summary:
Author: Winelady

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 141,995Chapters: 44/44Kudos: 878

Summary: ‚ÄúTHAT IS MY CHILD.‚Äù Stiles roared to the receiver.Stiles‚Äô roar echoed in his own ears as he slammed his fist down on the desk, rattling everything on it. He immediately glanced at Eli, making sure the noise hadn‚Äôt disturbed him. The kid barely stirred, his small frame bundled up in blankets on the couch. Stiles took a deep breath, lowering his voice but not his intensity.‚ÄúYou don‚Äôt get to decide that, Scott,‚Äù he hissed into the phone. ‚ÄúYou don‚Äôt get to decide what‚Äôs best for my kid. That‚Äôs my job. And if you think for a second that leaving him out there to fend for himself was somehow a better option than calling me, you‚Äôre even more deluded than I thought.‚Äù****After Derek's death Eli struggles with his control over the wolf. Scott and Allison was too busy playing house to help him. So he makes a quick decision to find his other dad. He heard he was magic. Maybe he could help him. Maybe he could bring his dad back.This fic is finished... I just add bonus chapters every now and then üòä‚ù§Ô∏è

entry.title: The Darker Side of the Moon
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,830Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 97

Summary: The pack was his home. His family.Until, suddenly, it wasn‚Äôt.No explanations, no goodbyes‚Äîjust the crushing silence of those Stiles had spent years risking his life for. He doesn‚Äôt understand. He tries to move on. He fails.And then, he disappears.Kidnapped. Isolated. Reduced to nothing in the hands of monsters who don‚Äôt need claws or fangs to tear him apart. Every day is a battle between pain and despair, every second a fight to hold on, to not break. But even the strongest souls have a limit.When that limit shatters, something inside him awakens. Something that was never meant to exist.Something that might save him.Or destroy him completely.

entry.title: Not Faking It!
entry.summary:
Author: PheonixInk

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 850Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 49

Summary: When Stiles needs a date to his dad‚Äôs department gala, Derek is the only option that won‚Äôt result in him being set up with every available single person in Beacon Hills. Pretending to be dating for one night should be easy except Stiles didn‚Äôt account for Derek being all in on the role. Hand holding? Sure. A casual arm around the waist? Fine. But when Derek starts whispering things in his ear, pulling him close like he actually wants this, Stiles starts to realize something terrifying. He doesn‚Äôt want to stop pretending.

entry.title: Hale & Stilinski: A Claim of Desire
entry.summary:
Author: WolfFeller

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,043Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 9

Summary: St. Patrick‚Äôs Day at The Silver Shamrock is alive with laughter, clinking glasses, and the unmistakable energy of celebration. Amidst the chaos, Peter Hale watches Isabelle Stilinski with a quiet, simmering possessiveness, unable to tear his eyes away from the woman who is undeniably his. Across the room, Derek Hale is doing a poor job of hiding his own territorial instincts as Stiles Stilinski charms the crowd with his carefree energy.As the night unfolds, tensions rise‚Äînot from bar fights or drunken revelry, but from the unmistakable jealousy brewing within the Hale men. Peter masks his with amusement, subtly reminding Isabelle of his claim on her, while Derek‚Äôs control shatters when another person dares to get too close to Stiles. The breaking point comes in the form of a possessive, heated kiss that leaves no room for doubt‚ÄîStiles is his.With Peter‚Äôs knowing smirk and Isabelle‚Äôs fond exasperation, it becomes clear: the Hales don‚Äôt just like their Stilinskis‚Äîthey claim them.

entry.title: Behind The Mask
entry.summary:
Author: GrimReaperlover11

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,877Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 139

Summary: NCIS Special Agent Noah Stilinski hated surprises...despised them even.So imagine his reaction when he is surprised to arrive at work and find out that his son, who he hasn't seen in a decade and a half standing in his squad room, apparently being assigned to his team.Follow Stiles as he adjusts to living in America again, after his history working for Polish Intelligence, now working under his father alongside Agents Isaac Lahey and Derek Hale.
